Description.en: Output to the standard output stream information about the collection (type, initialization date, number of elements, etc.)
Output to the standard output stream all elements of the collection in a string representation
Add a new element to the collection
Update the value of the element in the collection whose id is equal to the specified
Remove an element from the collection by its id

Name.en: Are you sure you want to clear the collection?

Description.en: Save the collection to a file

SaveError.en: Error while saving collection to file: %s

AskFilePath.en: You can specify another file or skip:

Description.en: 'path to csv file where collection will be stored'
Delete the first element from the collection
Delete the last element from the collection
Output the first element of the collection
Output the last element of the collection
Output the average value of the impactSpeed field for all humans
Output elements whose impact speed field value is greater than the specified one
Print the elements of the collection sorted by impact speed

IllegalOrder.en: Invalid sort order. Valid values: asc, des

Description.en: Add Human with random fields to collection
